Google Apps are popular for enterprise document management and email, due in no small part to their simplicity and ease of use. But to have a great Google Apps experience, the services needs to be set up, users need to be managed, and trouble needs to be shot. In this course, Julio Appling helps you launch Google Apps at your organization.
